channel.title: How to make an admin wep
channel.description:
does anyone no how to make an admin wep that kills in one hit?
or could they walk me threw it thanks if you can =)

it doesnt let me put the source folder anywere… like ill put the folder into a new folder on the desktop and whn i go to open it its not there…

item.title: How to make an admin wep
item.dc:creator: @sean2 sean_
item.description:
@sean2 wrote:

[quote=“d man103456, post:7, topic:219763”]to open .cfg files notepad > file > open > source folder > all files > the .cfg file

If you want a admin wep that 1 hits go into item.cfg and search for the code of the item and change the third to last numbe to 999999999[/quote]
the third to last number is a def bonus, the 2nd to last is str. and it doesnt need to be that extreme 10k stats will work fine, not almost a billion str (a little overpowering?)

Read full topic

item.title: How to make an admin wep
item.dc:creator: @sean2 sean_
item.description:
@sean2 wrote:

ok. on most ppl’s servers it either the pring or the glowing dagger. ill show u how to edit any bonus tho

first, go to item.cfg
then search for the item u want to change the bonuses of.

lets say u wanted to make the bronze 2h the most powerful wepon in the game (why not eh?)
search for bronze_2h (or the item id if u know it) you’ll find something like this

tem = 1307	Bronze_2h_sword	A_two_handed_sword.	66.5306993869115	66.5306993869115	73.8097935482396	-4	9	8	-4	0	0	0	0	0	-1	10	0

ok, the first number is the item id. then the item name and examine. the first 3 numbers after that r the sell/buy/alch prices. and all the numbers after that are the bonuses

hope it helpeed

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an admin wep

item.title: How to make an admin wep
item.dc:creator: @Rmds90 Rmds90
item.description:
@Rmds90 wrote:

go into your item.cfg file then do ctrl + f and find the id of the weapon you want. Then go along and find its bonuses and change them to 9999999. But people will still be able to use them.

item = 747	Glowing_dagger	A_black_obsidian_dagger,_it_has_a_strange_aura_about_it_-_it_seems_to_be_glowing.	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999

This is what it would look like if you changed it its bonuses so it kills in one hit.

Read full topic
